summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Miracalis - Best Face Cream Moisturizer With Advanced Anti Aging Wrinkle Formula. Clinically Proven To Reduce Wrinkle Depth, Smooth Fine Lines & Soften Skin. Cruelty Free, Hypoallergenic Review Date: 2014/10/05 Store: Miracalis Product Description: ['* Face Moisturizer * Face Anti Aging * Deep Hydration Face Cream * Hydrating Anti Aging Moisturizer * Aging Cream * Hydration Cream For Face * Regenerating Day Cream * Face Moisturizing Cream * Facial Moisturizers Anti Aging * Anti Aging Facial Cream * Hydrating Moisturizer for Face * Deep Moisturizing Face Cream * Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Moisturizing Cream Anti Aging * Peptide Face Cream * Moisturizer Facial Cream * Deep Face Moisturizer * Hydrating Facial Moisturizer * Best Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Anti Aging Skin Care * Bare Mineral * Neck Moisturizer * Neck Cream * Skin Cream * Anti Aging Skin', 'Your Face Will Look Lovelier In Only 15 Days!', 'Reduces the depth of your facial wrinkles with daily use.', 'You will quickly look noticeably younger, healthier, and more attractive.', 'Simply apply Miracalis Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream right after washing your face in the morning and again at night.', 'What About My Skin Type?', 'A safe, gentle, hypoallergenic formula that is tested and recommended for all 4 major skin types: Normal, Sensitive, Dry or Oily Skin', 'Your Shield Against The Signs Of Aging', "Your skin is under daily attack - air pollution, the sun's harmful rays, germs and time itself all wear down your skin's natural barriers. The result is dry, cracked and tired looking skin.", 'Our formula restores the two natural antioxidants (Vitamin E and Co-Enzyme Q10) that your skin needs to properly repair and maintain this barrier.', 'Your skin will look younger, be less sensitive. You will have healthier, attractive and glowing skin again.', '100% Satisfaction Guaranteed, Made in the USA'] Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.63 x 2.63 x 2.05 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MIR-AAM001', 'UPC': '820103882309 794168056596', 'Manufacturer': 'Miracalis'} Review Text: "Great feeling cream! Cool going on. Liked the e-book on Anti-Aging tips. I'm working on my "marionette" aging lines starting to go down from my mouth. They actually look less noticeable. This may just be the cream to soften & MAYBE get rid of them! Keeping my fingers crossed-Thank you!" Review Title: Cool going on Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pink Hair Brush Review Date: 2014/12/12 Store: THZY Product Description: ['FLAT IRON'] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.9 x 1.7 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VZ-DETBR-PK', 'UPC': '609595109299', 'Manufacturer': 'THZY'} Review Text: Love this brush! It really fits in your hand & feels so good on your scalp! It does the job for detangling without ripping my hair out or breaking the ends off! I laid the brush down & the next thing I knew, my cat was rubbing his chin on it! A sure sign that it's a good brush! I'm getting my granddaughter one because she uses a brush on her wet long hair. She really needs to quit pulling & breaking her hair. Thanks for a great product! Review Title: Love this brush Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Professional Grade Retinol Anti-Aging Skin Moisturizing Cream - For Age Spots - By Swiss Botany Review Date: 2014/12/12 Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.69 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '791154469675'} Review Text: Great moisturizer! This cream does indeed absorb into the skin. It feels refreshing & it doesn't have a scent to me. I've been using a lot of various serums & having an actual cream to use is a nice change! The pump dispenses nicely & there's no waste. Quite a lot of uses in the bottle. I'll be using this for a quite a while-Thanks for a great product! Review Title: Great moisturizer! This cream does indeed absorb into the ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Retinol 2.5% Cream From Majestic Pure for Face and Eye Area Will Nourish Your Skin, Potent Anti Aging Formula Reduces Wrinkles, Stretch Marks & Redness, 50ml Review Date: 2015/08/23 Store: MAJESTIC PURE Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAJESTIC PURE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 2.9 x 2.4 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '784190666689 684758988935'} Review Text: Majestic Pure is one of my favorite brands. They offer a money back guarantee & offer quality products. This Retinol Moisturizer Cream is another winner. You just need a bit & it feels so silky & smooth & so does your skin. There is no oily, greasy feel & didn't cause me any burning or redness. It was refreshing & the added moisturizer kept the Retinol from drying out my skin. I did receive this cream at a reduced cost for an honest opinion. Thank You! Review Title: Majestic Pure is one of my favorite brands. They offer a money back guarantee & ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamin C Serum for Face - C Booster With Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E - Anti Wrinkle - Anti Aging - Skin Repair For Age Spots and Sun Damage - For Men and Women Review Date: 2016/04/30 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Volume': '30 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.04 x 1.97 x 1.73 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} Review Text: 180 Cosmetics C Booster Vit C Serum w/ hyaluronic acid & Vit E
This products says it helps with hydration, elasticity & suppleness. It's true! That is exactly what it does!
I use this serum morning & night on clean skin. You just need a thin layer. I use it on my neck also. Then, just as the directions state- add your moisturizer. Very easy! I put what's left on the backs of my hands. I am trying to get into the practice of using the same products on my face & then on my elbows & backs of hands. It really makes a difference!
I like the look of the bottle & the thin jelly-like serum. I've had other Vitamin C serums & I like 180' the best. It makes my skin look hydrated & feeds my wrinkles some nutrients. Hard to describe! Not a 20 year difference but I am 66. I still look like me-just healthier.
I did receive my serum at a reduced price for an honest opinion. It's great! Thank You!! Review Title: Very easy! I put what's left on the backs of ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Highest Quality At Home Electric Callus Remover- For the Smoothest, Softest And Cleanest, Feet Review Date: 2016/06/19 Store: Clear N Smooth Product Description: ["Looking For a Quick And Easy Way to Get Your Feet Looking Clean, Healthy And Attractive, But Don't Want to Pay the Price... By Purchasing Smooth N' Clear Powerful Rechargeable Electric Callus Remover you can power your way to smoother, healthier-looking feet in minutes!! Treat yourself to the luxury of soft, beautiful, clean, And Sexy feet in the privacy of your own home with the Highest Quality At Home Electric Callus Remover. Simply apply moderate pressure to callused areas, and the rotating head will do all the work for you. For your comfort and safety, the grinding head will gently and effectively buff away hard, callused skin. Powerful Replaceable Head is Specially Designed With Long Lasting Micro-Abrasive Surface for Pulverizing Dead Skin In an Instant. We Don't Want You Embarrassed Of Being Barefoot Anymore!!!"] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Clear N Smooth', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 5.31 x 2.01 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'Item model number': '744430694193', 'UPC': '744430694193', 'Manufacturer': 'Smooth N Clear'} Review Text: Callus Remover from Smooth N Clear
How can this actually be fun? Well, not fun-fun, but interesting. I can't believe how much dead skin comes off while you are "sanding" your feet! It is amazing!
No amount of foot scrubs or using the little egg with blades could do better. This Callus Remover is so easy to use. When I am finished using this remover, I admire & touch my feet - then I put lotion or vaseline on & then some white socks. I wear the socks overnight. In the morning, my feet are so soft & free of dead skin & any beginnings of calluses. Easy! I don't use the remover every night, just maybe once or twice a week. Maybe, skip a week. So it doesn't feel like just another chore.
This Callus Remover comes nicely packaged & you get a cleaning brush & 2 rollers. I just wish I knew where I could get some extra rollers. I feel the machine itself might outlast the 2 rollers. If I find some rollers that fit - I'll update my review.
I did receive my remover for a reduced cost for an honest opinion. Thank You!! Review Title: ... from Smooth N Clear How can this actually be fun? Well Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history suggests a strong preference for skincare and beauty products, particularly focused on anti-aging and moisturizing benefits, as indicated by multiple purchases of creams and serums. The user consistently emphasizes desired outcomes such as wrinkle reduction, deep hydration, and overall skin health, reflecting a prioritization of effective formulations. 

Sentiment scores show high satisfaction, especially with products that provide noticeable results and feel pleasant during application. Despite this, there are some lower ratings in the inventory, suggesting mild disappointment with a few items. 

Common themes include an interest in routine use of facial products, as well as a holistic approach to skincare that includes neck and hand treatments. Quality is paramount, as seen by preferences for reputable brands offering satisfaction guarantees and effective ingredients. 

There is evidence of price sensitivity; the user often mentions receiving items at reduced costs in exchange for honest reviews, indicating a cautious approach to spending. High ratings accompany products that deliver on hydration and texture without greasiness, while items with disappointing results have lower ratings.

In summary, this consumer values effective anti-aging skincare solutions, prioritizes product quality and effectiveness, is moderately price-sensitive, and is willing to explore various products to maintain youthful and healthy skin.

target_interaction.title: Just the perfect size & weight for my purse
target_interaction.text:
Evolve Boar Bristle Purse Size Brush
I needed a new brush for my purse & now I have one! Just the perfect size & weight for my purse. Lightweight yet sturdy. No plastic! This brush would also be perfect for a toddler's hair or an elderly person's thin hair. No sharp edges to poke you!
I have never had a boar's hair brush so I suppose there is a bald boar running around somewhere! Not in my neighborhood, I hope!!
I just hope I don't lose this brush! I have a hard time keeping brushes. Usually, I lose them. Sometimes my cat decides he likes my brush, so I give in. He needs to stay out of my purse!
I'm hoping this brush works out. Then I will graduate up to the larger sizes. I think the plastic brushes are rough on my hair & pull some hair out.
So far, I'm loving this brush. It really smooths & tames my hair down If you want a natural soft brush, this is the one for you. I don't use this brush on wet hair. I switched over to a wide tooth comb. My plastic brushes are in the trash!!
I did receive this brush at a reduced cost for an honest opinion. I love it! Thank You!!
